thread.title: Todd Cromwell, CEO & Founder, Kids On Safari
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Todd Cromwell, CEO & Founder, Kids On Safari

author: Todd Cromwell, CEO & Founder, Kids On Safari
title: Todd Cromwell, CEO & Founder, Kids On Safari
text: Best price on this Canon camcorder and always confident that everything will arrive as advertised. Have purchased from B&H over 25 years which always lives up to expectations. Very important because I am buying for a 501(C)3 non-profit Kenyan Kids On Safari that is helping bush kids to become conservation-minded and the future world-class wildlife photographers. Ideal career since they are growing up next to wildlife reserves where they can catch "the action" when it occurs.
